As a result, new time zones were created for the cities on the border with the United States. I'm not sure if the issue is with Dayjs or the Docker image being used. https://unicode-org.atlassian.net/browse/CLDR-16181 ![image](https://github.com/louislam/uptime-kuma/assets/30887270/b20a86f2-c18d-4247-98f8-6c45b286389c) ### Reproduction steps 1 .I created the container with the following command: "docker run -d --restart=always -p 3001:3001 -v uptime-kuma:/app/data --name uptime-kuma louislam/uptime-kuma:1" 2.
